explanation.Packing Plant: Location is derived from this column
explanation.Ship Week: Week # in a given year - for comparison between weekly sales across year
explanation.Line Item: Detailed commodity description, including internal commodity number
explanation.CAD Price Per LB: Unit price converted into CAD given exchange rate
explanation.Item Weight: Weight of everything excluding things like pallet
explanation.CAD Price: CAD unit price x item weight
explanation.Order Status: unpacked - packed - shipped - verified (sales price verified) - exported(QBO)
explanation.Sold Quantity: Not used, should always be Quantity
explanation.Weight: Not used, includes weights of everything, including pallet
